author: 3DPrinting.com
description: Excamera Labs has created a 3D-printed box forming mandrel to streamline packaging assembly for their TermDriver2 product shipments. The company developed the tool to address the time-intensive process of manually folding thousands of product boxes for shipping. The mandrel functions as a tapered jig that allows flat box blanks to be pressed into their final […]
title: Excamera Labs Develops 3D-Printed Box Assembly Tool for Small-Scale Production - 3DPrinting.com
